definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: It was Guri who killed the entire board of directors for the rival Ororo Transportation.
sentences.chinese: 是古麗清洗了競爭對手奧羅羅運輸公司的整個董事會。

sentences.english: Shape the nail, using a file or emery board .
sentences.chinese: 塑造釘子，使用一個文件或金剛砂董事會。

sentences.english: The board thus far has supported the 62-year-old Mr.
sentences.chinese: 美國銀行董事會目前仍然支持現年62歲的劉易斯。

sentences.english: I'm planning to run for the school board.
sentences.chinese: 我打算競選聯合校董事會董事。

sentences.english: Tang’s son Tang King Loy is a member of the company’s board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 鄧耀之子鄧敬來是該公司董事會成員。

sentences.english: A board of directors controls corporate policies. The directors appoint top company officers.
sentences.chinese: 公司的董事會掌握公司決策權，指定企業高層領導。

sentences.english: He presents his idea to the board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 他將自己的想法上報董事會。

sentences.english: The new US$100 million funding is subject to approval by the World Bank's Board of Directors.
sentences.chinese: 1億美元追加資金需經世行董事會審批。

sentences.english: The board of directors has been fudging on the question of pay increases for the workers.
sentences.chinese: 董事會對於給工人增加工資這個問題一直推託。

sentences.english: Today, he's chairman of the board of the oil company Rosneft.
sentences.chinese: 目前，他還是石油公司Rosneft的董事會主席。

sentences.english: In 1889 Annie Besant was elected to the London School Board .
sentences.chinese: 在1889年安妮貝贊特當選爲倫敦學校董事會。

sentences.english: The board of directors canvassed his design thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 董事會徹底討論了他的設計。

sentences.english: Boards at all four companies recommended voting against the say-on-pay proposals.
sentences.chinese: 四家公司的董事會都建議投票否決該提案。

sentences.english: Appeals to local elected officials and the Regents went nowhere, they say.
sentences.chinese: 他們說求助於當地競選官員，董事會就哪都去不了。

sentences.english: But I am a lucky in that Bill and the board have been really good to me.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸運比爾和董事會都對我很寬待。

sentences.english: Mr Darling said the new Northern Rock board would operate at arm’s length from the government.
sentences.chinese: 達林表示，新一屆北巖董事會將獨立於英國政府運作。

definition: to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
